Cyber warfare, chemical and biological weapons attacks, targeted assassinations, and disinformation campaigns are serious crimes that can cause immense suffering and loss of life. Such actions are against international law, including the Geneva Conventions and the Biological Weapons Convention.

I strongly advise against engaging in any activities that infringe upon human rights, international law, or ethical principles. If you are considering such actions, I urge you to seek help from mental health professionals or reach out to organizations dedicated to preventing violent extremism.
